descriptions.Access: Reach the console and slice into the system before enemy reinforcements arrive.
descriptions.Acquire: An important item has been dropped. Secure it and escape off any table edge.
descriptions.Defend: Hold off waves of enemies trying to overrun your position.
descriptions.Deliver: Pick up the package and deliver it to the designated drop-off point.
descriptions.Eliminate: A high-value target is on the field. Take them out.
descriptions.FightOff: Survive the enemy assault until extraction arrives.
descriptions.MoveThrough: At least two crew members must escape off the far table edge.
descriptions.Patrol: Visit and scan three designated patrol points on the map.
descriptions.Protect: A VIP must be escorted to the safe zone in the center of the map.
descriptions.Secure: Clear the central area of enemies and hold it for two consecutive turns.
descriptions.Search: Search the area around the objective marker to find the hidden intel.

Access.failure: Access denied. The system remains locked.

Acquire.failure: The asset was lost or destroyed.

Defend.success: The position was held and the attackers repelled.
Defend.failure: The position was overrun by the enemy.

Deliver.success: Package delivered to the drop-off point.
Deliver.failure: The delivery could not be completed.

FightOff.success: The enemy assault was fought off successfully.
FightOff.failure: The crew was overwhelmed by the enemy assault.

MoveThrough.success: The crew successfully moved through the area.
MoveThrough.failure: The crew could not get enough members through the area.

Patrol.success: The area has been fully patrolled.
Patrol.failure: The patrol could not be completed.

Protect.success: The VIP was safely escorted to the extraction zone.
Protect.failure: The VIP was incapacitated or the crew was eliminated.

Secure.failure: The crew was unable to secure the location.

Search.success: Intel found! The search was a success.
Search.failure: The search area was thoroughly checked, but the intel was not found.
